name: Spline 3D Model
summary: Learn about .SPLINE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Spline is an online tool that 3D modelers can use to create 3D characters, scenes, product mockups, logos, and more. While Spline automatically saves the models that users create online, in their Spline cloud storage, users can also download the models they create as SPLINE files. This allows users to retain a local, backup copy of their Spline models.
To export a Spline model as a SPLINE file:
Select the three-line menu button (next to your model's name).
Name and save your SPLINE file.

description: A SPLINE file is a 3D model created by Spline, a web-based 3D modeling tool. It contains one or more 3D shapes used to model a 3D object or scene. SPLINE files may also contain 2D text and vector graphics.

instructions: You can open a SPLINE file with Spline (Web). To do so, go to the app's Home screen and select Import. Then, follow the instructions to import your SPLINE file.
You can use Spline to convert a SPLINE file to the following formats:
To do so, open your SPLINE file, then select the Export button.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .spline file in Spline
images.caption: SPLINE file open in Spline
